0.name: The hills
desc: You are on a path leading north, small hills surrounds you. You feel
the forces of evil approach you from the north.

1.name: The hills
desc: "   You are on a small path leading north, dark threatening hills
surrounds you to almost all sides.  There is a path to the west, leading
towards a mysterious castle.

2.name: End of the path
desc: "   There is a path here leading south through a barren, burned wasteland.
To the north, a large cave leads into a craggy, ominous mountain range.
Far more daunting, however, is the huge crater to the northeast.  No
less than 800 yards in diameter, this hole in the ground must have been
created by an impact or explosion of immense proportions.  The rock
underfoot has been fused into a smooth, glassy substance.
The sign says:
* *                    The Mines of Moria                           * *
* *                  Enter at your own risk.                        * *
* *     Welcome to the mines of Moria.. At present there are only   * *
* *           3 levels. Later the plan is to build 20...            * *
* *     Are you below level 3 Don't enter..                         * *
* *     Are you below level 8 Don't enter alone..                   * *

10.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in a cave, to the south you sense fresh air. To the north a
small tunnel continues into the mountain.

11.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You force your way through a small tunnel, to you south you sense
a little fresh air, and to the north the tunnel continues.

12.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a small tunnel, to the north there is a cave. The tunnel
continues to the east.

13.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a small tunnel leading east-west. The floor is covered by
dust.

14.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a tunnel, the tunnel continues to the south and to the
west, to the north there is a cave.

15.name: The tunnel
15.desc: "   You are in a small tunnel, the tunnel continues west.

16.name: The large cave
desc: "   You are in a large cave, the cave continues east and west, to the south
you notice a small tunnel.

17.name: The large cave
17.desc: "   You are in the east end of the large cave.

18.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in the south end of a cave, to the south you see a tunnel. You
notice a large pile of bones in the corner.

extra.desc: Well you better watch out - some of the bones are human !

19.name: The tunnel
19.desc: "   You are in a north-south leading tunnel.

20.name: The hole
20.desc: "   You are by a hole in the floor, you can leave down, or north.

21.name: The hole
21.desc: "   You are by a hole in the floor, exits are down or east.

22.name: The damp tunnel
desc: "   You are in a damp tunnel, your clothes feel wet. The tunnel continues
to the north, to the west you see a hole in the floor and to the east
there is a large cave.

23.name: The large cave
desc: "   You are in the western part of the large cave, to the west you see
a damp tunnel.

24.name: The damp tunnel
24.desc: "   You are in a damp tunnel, that leads west.

25.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in the north end of a cave. To the east you see some tunnels
which leads in many directions.

26.name: The many tunnels
26.desc: "   You are in a tunnel, that leads of in all directions.

27.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you also notice a tunnel to
the west. From the north you sense the fresh air!

28.name: The smelly tunnel
desc: "   You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you see a small light
to the north. You notice a strange smell from the north..

29.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in a cave that is filled with fresh air, you sense the
wind blowing from the north. To the south you see a small tunnel
continue into the mountain.

30.name: The light cave
desc: "   You are in a light cave, through a hole large above you, you see
the sky. A small tunnel to the south is the only way out.
You notice the source of the strange smell, all around you there is
corpses from several monsters.

31.name: The valley
desc: "   You are in a small valley, surrounded by hills and a mountain to
the south. In the mountain there is a cave.  To the north, a path
stretches into the hills.

extra.desc: Well it doesn't look nice, but it's the only way out..

desc: You can see the path through the hills. To the far north, you can make out
some smoke.

50.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a tunnel, which turns here. The tunnel continues to the
east and the south.

51.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in an east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel is very narrow
here.

52.name: The tunnel
52.desc: "   You are in an east-west leading tunnel.

53.name: The tunnel
53.desc: "   You are at a turn, the tunnel continues north and east.

54.name: The light cave
desc: "   You are in a cave, to south from you there is a large fire that lights
the entire cave, to the east and west tunnels leads off.

55.name: The maze
desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. Only exit is west to a
light cave.

56.name: The light cave
desc: "   You are in a light cave, a large fire in front of you lights the room.
The cave continues to the north and south.

extra.desc: Well, errh - It looks somehow quite warm..!

57.name: The maze
desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. Exits leads both north
and south.

58.name: The maze
58.desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. Exits leads west and south.

59.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a tunnel, only exit is to the east. You sense that the
tunnel leads slightly down.

60.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a small tunnel, to the west the tunnel continues and
to the east you see some light.

61.name: The light cave
desc: "   You are in the south end of a light cave, tunnels leads of to the
south and west.

62.name: The maze
62.desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. Exits leads east and west.

63.name: The maze
63.desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. Exits leads north and east.

64.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a tunnel, only exit is west - Only exit, well there is
also a hole in the ceiling.

65.name: The maze
desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. The tunnel continues east.
To the north there is a light cave.

66.name: The maze
desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. Exits leads east and
north. To the south is a large cave.

67.name: The maze
desc: "   You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. Exits leads west and
north.

68.name: The large cave
68.desc: "   You are in the northwest end of a large cave.

69.name: The large cave
desc: "   You are in the northeast end of a large cave. To the north the
is a small damp tunnel.

70.name: The large cave
70.desc: "   You are in the southwest end of a large cave.

71.name: The large cave
desc: "   You are in the southeast end of a large cave. To the east you
notice a small tunnel.

72.name: The tunnel
desc: "   You are in a narrow tunnel, which leads both to the east and the
south. There is also an exit towards the west, where you see a large
cave.

73.name: End of tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel stops here. There is no other exits than the one you
came from.

74.name: Dead End
74.desc: "   You've arrived at a dead end.

75.name: The Plains
desc: You are on the plains, to the north you notice a small path into the
hills. A large chain is fastened to the ground right next to you.  It
looks like you can climb up it and into the clouds above.
